ygData.subject: new shadow knight here
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all. I occasionally take a break from my magi to play a sk on Xegony. I was wondering what would be a nice 2H magic weapon to quest for, for a first
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all. I occasionally take a break from my magi to play a sk on Xegony.
I was wondering what would be a nice 2H magic weapon to quest for, for a
first magic weapon. I'm not asking for any real spoilers, perhaps someone
could point me in the right direction ?

My troll is level 8 at the moment and had saved enough plat to by a regular
steel halberd at 36p. I've been told a few time that was monumentously
stupid, but heh what can I say, troll's ain't rose that far out of the
swamp ) Anyway, having only played a magi I'm not used to dealing with
weapons and such, so what would be nice to have ? what are some price ranges
to save for, etc ? Any help/thoughts on the subject would be cool, and my
thanks to you.

Bumzuk of Grobb
